scripts.convert:webp:src: find ./src -type f \( -iname "*.jpg" -o -iname "*.jpeg" \) -exec sh -c 'for img; do cwebp -q 80 "$img" -o "${img%.*}.webp"; done' sh {} +
scripts.convert:webp:uploads: find ./public/uploads -type f \( -iname "*.jpg" -o -iname "*.jpeg" \) -exec sh -c 'for img; do cwebp -q 80 "$img" -o "${img%.*}.webp"; done' sh {} +
scripts.convert:webp: npm run convert:webp:src && npm run convert:webp:uploads
scripts.delete:jpg: npm run delete:jpg:src && npm run delete:jpg:uploads
